rules_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand. You may cast a nonland card with mana value 3 or less from the other pile without paying its mana cost, then put that pile into your graveyard.
flavor_text: [i]“With the chance I've been given, I'm gonna be driven as hell.”[/i]
notes: Chip On My Shoulder from Legally Blonde (the musical)
